About Me

Hi, welcome to my personal web page, I’m François and I’m a freshly graduate student from IMT Atlantique, I’m currently doing my final internship as a Radio System Engineer in Bouygues Telecom (French Mobile ISP). I’m also interested in IoT and analyzing data.

I am most skilled in: Python and mobile networks

Super awesome project

I started this project as a way if learning React and it has since grown into a fully fledged app. I have learned many skills through this and been I’m very proud of having this in my portfolio. If you don’t have a project as awesome as this I would advise you make one.

Experience

Bouygues Telecom

https://www.bouygues.com/en/activities/telecoms/bouygues-telecom/

Radio System Engineer Intern

March - September 2019

Solving 21st century problems by diging holes and making game changing products like the *not a flamethrower*

As the data usage keeps increasing, Bouygues Telecom has to optimize its network as hard as it can. At the same time, there is a 4G simulator that’s need to be adjusted with current data to be accurate. Thus, I’m currently analyzing data from mobile networks to improve the 4G simulator and to prepare the deployment of 5G. At the same time, I’m identify information sources concerning 5G to develop models for the incoming 5G simulator.

Arc France

Industrial Placement

July - August 2017

Solving 21st century problems by diging holes and making game changing products like the *not a flamethrower*

During my first experience in industry, I worked on an assembly line and I was also in charge of checking the final quality of industrial products. I think that experience could help me understand better the needs of industries, if I have to work in IoT domain, especially with the Industry 4.0 .
